name: Colonial Terrace Motor Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: making an unplanned trip so us at 7.00 pm in Raymond Terrace looking for a bed. reception was welcoming but only had family rooms left. Room was large double bed in front section then bathroom & 3 single beds in rear section. Offered to keep restaruant opened but we had already eaten. Breakfast was ample for cost.
reviews.title: A place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Air conditioner was in rear section so had to work hard to warm front section while rear was way to hot. a/c fan also became very noisy after running for a while & had to be turned off. shower head sprayed water everywhere. while the room was ok for 2 if a family of 5 stayed it would a line up for showers & toilet.
reviews.title: Good Value for Overnight Stay

description: Conveniently located in the Raymond Terrace CBD, 5 min from the Pacific Highway and 15 min from Newcastle (Williamtown) Airport, the Colonial Terrace Motor Inn is a great place to stay, work, rest and dine. Our Restaurant is open 7 days a week for Breakfast and Monday - Thursday for Dinner.
